column4: i'm looking for a home-use printer/scanner (photo printing ability would be nice) any suggestion or recommendations?
and 2 of my friends have HPs
what model is that, i need something highly linux compatible, free drivers are a plus
thats just a printer isn't it? know of any printer/scanner combos i could use?
oh! no kidding? that sounds perfect. I've spent some time googling but haven't come up with a clear leader. is this the one you would recommend?
well, i have it and it works with no problem. so i guess
actually... the printer and scanner worked with no proble
